channel.title: permission to ping gateway
channel.description: Hello. I have setup whonix gateway with a pfsense firewall behind it. pfsense has 2 WAN's the main with whonix gateway and a secondary from another line. I have setup a pfsense with a gateway group which enables the pfsense to share internet primarily from Whonix and if whonix is off from the other line. For this to work I need to be able to have the whonix gateway send ping reply so that pfsense can see that the gateway is up? I don't want to have external pings. Just a ping inside the Whonix internal network. Can anyone help?
